ModMetaData.name: ED-PersonalAnimalShields
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 03.00.00
Requires: ED-PersonalNanoShields
Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995 Please Use that Thread for Discussion / Feedback that would like me to reply to. Ideally Bugs should be logged on GitHub although in the discussion thread is also fine.
This allows Personal Nano Shields to be added to animals. WARNING: This will only work on animals that spawn after the mod is installed and will break your save game if it is uninstalled when and animal spawned while the mod is active is on the map (not just animals that you have put shields on).
